actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage manufacturing-related investment in any State which has an unemployment rate which exceeds the national unemployment rate.

summary.text: Accelerated Depreciation Allowance Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers to elect accelerated amortization (twice the allowable depreciation deduction) for manufacturing property placed in service in States having an unemployment rate which is greater than six percent between October 1, 1976 and October 1, 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage manufacturing-related investment in any State which has an unemployment rate which exceeds the national unemployment rate.
